fields.doc: Coordinate system for position. CSys_Observed is refracted apparent topocentric, e.g. similar to CSys_Mount but the telescope model is applied and the azimuth is wrapped. If CSys_None then position should be ignored.
fields.name: coordinateSystem

fields.doc: Longitude, latitude axes of position in coordinateSystem
fields.name: position

fields.doc:
Rotation system for cameraAngle:
        * Rot_NONE: The camera rotator is not used; ignore cameraAngle.
        * Rot_SKY: Position angle of focal plane +Y, measured from N through E.
          At 0 degrees, +Y is along N and +X is along E/W depending on handedness.
          At 90 degrees, +Y is along E and +X is along S/N depending on handedness.
        * Rot_HORIZON: Position angle of focal plane +Y, measured from +Alt through +Az.
          At 0 degrees, +Y is along +Alt and +X is along +/-Az, depending on handedness.
          At 90 degrees, +Y is along +Az and +X is along -/+Alt, depending on handedness.
        * Rot_MOUNT: The position sent to the instrument rotator; the details depend on the rotator.
fields.name: rotationSystem

fields.doc: Comma-separated names of acceptable filters, or blank for any filter.
fields.name: filters

fields.doc: Estimated duration of the script, excluding slewing to the initial position required by the script.
fields.name: duration
